;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;In one day, seven inspection points were conducted across two provinces and cities.

;

;Braving the severe cold, going out early and coming back late, non-stop.

;

;From rural areas and communities to campuses and shops, from fields to river dams, I took a short break in the car at noon... In order to learn more about post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, in order to learn more about the same situation. Face-to-face communication with disaster-stricken people.

;

;"During that time, I paid attention to the disaster every day and guided the relief work. I was always thinking about the disaster-stricken areas and the affected people. I said at that time that when the post-disaster recovery and reconstruction reached a certain stage, we must Let's see again."

;

;"Especially in winter, can people stay safe and warm through the winter? What other difficulties are there in life?"

;

;November 10, the day after the beginning of winter. General Secretary Xi Jinping came to Beijing, Mentougou District in Hebei Province, which was severely affected by the disaster, and Zhuozhou City in Baoding, to visit and express condolences to the victims, and to inspect and guide post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work.

;

;I arrived "as promised" because I was "always worried".

;

;I still remember the 2014 Ludian earthquake in Yunnan. Five months later, on the day before the Great Cold, the General Secretary came to the epicenter canyon after a bumpy journey.

;

;I still remember that the flood situation in Anhui in 2020 was serious. One month later, under the scorching sun, I visited the 800-mile Chaohu embankment.

;

;I still remember that there will be rare heavy rains in Shanxi in 2021. Three months later, just after the Lunar New Year, I walked along the winding mountain road and braved the snow to both sides of the Fen River.

;

;When the storm hits, who is the most reliable backbone? Who is the real hero?

;

;During this inspection, General Secretary Xi Jinping attended a theme class meeting for children at Miaofengshan National School. The children used clay to create the "cutest people" in their hearts: the PLA uncle covered in mud and water, the rescue uncle who left early and returned late, the village cadres who were too busy to touch the ground, and the medical staff in white coats...

;

;Fire can reveal true gold, and adversity can reveal true love. The reality of flood fighting and disaster relief is the most infectious "ideological and political lesson".

;

;"The Communist Party of China has always been the people's party. In times of crisis, our party's organizations and party members and cadres at all levels will be on the front line for the people."

;

;"Especially Once there is a disaster, there are two that stand out the most: one is our people's soldiers, and the other is our party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres under the red flag."

;

;Every word, every word, speaks loudly; every move, every action, Keep your promise.

;

;These are the words from the heart of the people——

;

;The home of Li Meng, a villager in Shuiyuzui Village, has been renovated and tidied up. She said to the General Secretary: "The old man at home He said that if he had suffered such a disaster in the early years, he would have had to flee. Thank you to the party and the government!"

;

;At the home of Dong Caiying, a resident of Yongji Xiuyuan Community, the temperature in the house has reached the standard. She told General Secretary: "In a word, the Party is better!"

;

;Fu Jun, a villager in Wanquanzhuang Village, was rebuilding his house. When he saw the General Secretary, he smiled: "The Party's policies are good, and it is good to catch up with them." It's time, otherwise it won't be built."

;

;In the heart of the General Secretary, the people are the real heroes.

;

;When I went to Tangshan, I praised the "heroic city" and "heroic people"; when I went to Wuhan, I said affectionately that "Wuhan will definitely be recorded in the annals of heroes again." The General Secretary has always sincerely praised the people.

;

;In the 2023 New Year's message, the General Secretary was very emotional: "Whenever we bid farewell to the old and welcome the new, we always think of the majestic spirit of the Chinese nation that has been passed down for thousands of years, which doubles our confidence in moving forward."

;< P>;Earthquakes, floods, droughts... The Chinese nation has struggled with natural disasters for thousands of years. It has experienced hardships and hardships. Not only has it never been crushed, but it has stood up unyieldingly in disasters and built our nation. Perseverance.

;

;Dong Caiying told the general secretary that the house was flooded and she was quite scared to be alone at home. The neighbors upstairs knocked on the door again and again to ask if she was okay, helped her move things, and let her stay in their house.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping was deeply moved: "In the face of disasters, our people are extremely strong. And in the process of disaster relief, everyone works together and helps each other."

;

;In Miaofengshan Nationality School, on the embankment by the Baigou River, General Secretary Xi Jinping cordially visited and expressed condolences to representatives from all walks of life involved in flood prevention and relief.

;

;"Camouflage green", "flame blue", "rescue red"... rush to help wherever there is need, and fight wherever the crisis is most critical.

;

;"When the sea is flowing, heroes show their true qualities. When one side is in trouble, all parties support it. There are countless supporting teams. It is no longer clear which organization, which aspect and where they come from." General Secretary explain.

;

;"Difficulties are not enough to be feared, but determination is stronger than iron." This is what the cadres and the masses said during the interview in Mentougou.

;

;"I am a son and daughter of Yanzhao, and I want to fight for Hebei." This is an eye-catching slogan on the streets of Zhuozhou City.

;

;The house was flooded and renovated; it collapsed and was rebuilt on the spot; the shop was flooded and quickly resumed business; the crops were flooded and they took advantage of the farming season to replant...

;

;In In the pharmacy and supermarket at the entrance of Yongji Xiuyuan Community, when the general secretary asked the shopkeeper "what other difficulties are there", the answer he got was "we are confident that the future will definitely get better and better."

;

;When leaving Wanquanzhuang Village, enthusiastic villagers crowded on both sides of the road, surrounded the General Secretary, and greeted the General Secretary loudly. Among the crowd, there were white-haired old people, young boys who were still childlike, and young children still in their arms.

;

;Facing the villagers, the General Secretary described his feelings at the end of the day: "I see hope from everyone's expressions. Our life after the disaster will be better than before. . I hope that the villagers will be self-reliant, work hard, and use their hard-working hands to speed up recovery and reconstruction and promote rural revitalization."

;

;The floods have receded, and heroic spirit is stirring in this land.

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 12)

; Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 确保受灾群众安全温暖过冬（学思想 强党性 重实践 建新功）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20231113_2-01.htm
;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;During this year’s flood season, extreme rainfall occurred in North China, Northeast China, Huanghuai and other places, causing floods and geological disasters, causing many Heavy casualties. General Secretary Xi Jinping attaches great importance to flood prevention, flood relief, and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, and has issued important instructions on many occasions, requiring relevant localities and departments to make every effort to protect the safety of people's lives and property and restore normal production and living order in the disaster areas as soon as possible. In early September, General Secretary Xi Jinping went to Shangzhi City, Heilongjiang Province to visit and express condolences to the victims. As winter sets in in the north, General Secretary Xi Jinping visited the severely affected areas in Beijing and Hebei to visit and express condolences to the affected people, and to inspect and guide post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work.

;

;When General Secretary Xi Jinping inspected post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work in Beijing and Hebei, he emphasized that “the second batch of thematic education is being carried out in depth. Party organizations at all levels in the disaster area must closely integrate thematic education with post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, and vigorously Carry forward the spirit of flood fighting and disaster relief, give full play to the fighting fortress role of grassroots party organizations and the vanguard and exemplary role of party members and cadres, and use the results of recovery and reconstruction and the satisfaction of the people to test the effectiveness of thematic education."

;

;Recently, reporters in many places When interviewing the post-disaster recovery and reconstruction situation, we learned that relevant departments will closely integrate the second batch of thematic education with post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, use funds in key areas, promote project construction with high quality, and ensure that the disaster-stricken people have a safe and warm winter.

;

;;Adhere to the two-pronged approach and two-promotion in educational practice;

;

;Many places adhere to the two-pronged approach and two-promotion in educational practice, and combine thematic education with post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work in depth combine.

;

;Beijing’s Fangshan District regards post-disaster recovery and reconstruction results as an important part of testing the effectiveness of the second batch of thematic education. In terms of house repair and reconstruction, it insists on optimizing and upgrading planning and design plans based on the people’s living needs.

;

;Beijing’s Mentougou District conducted research on the frontline of post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, implemented the "Tough Month" campaign for a warm winter, established 9 post-disaster reconstruction teams and 3 post-disaster reconstruction working groups, and started the repair and reconstruction of 2,557 farmhouses. , rectified 469 hidden dangers in gas pipelines, repaired heating equipment in 10,749 households, and restored coal-to-electricity conversion in 90 villages, making every effort to ensure the safety and warmth of the people through the winter.

;

;Districts in Tianjin severely affected by the severe floods in the Haihe River Basin focus on solving the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the masses, and encourage party members and cadres to combine theoretical study, investigation and research, promote development, review and rectification with strengthening the awareness of purpose, responding to the needs of the masses, Drive problem-solving together. Wuqing District held a theme education mobilization and deployment meeting to give full play to the role of grassroots party organizations as a battle fortress and effectively gather the strong joint efforts of party members and the masses to rebuild their homes; it accelerated the progress of post-disaster recovery and reconstruction, focusing on the repair, reinforcement and reconstruction of dangerous buildings, roads and other infrastructure. We will do our best to solve the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the masses.

;

;;Use learning results to promote doing your job well;

;

;During the flood season, heating facilities in many places were damaged. Relevant departments took the theme education as an opportunity to use the learning results to promote their jobs well, and solved the pain points and difficulties that restricted the affected people from having a safe and warm winter, one by one.

;

;The weather is getting colder and colder, but Cao Yunfeng goes out more often. He is a member of the Party branch of Beizi Village, Songlindian Town, Zhuozhou City, Baoding, Hebei Province. He is also responsible for contacting the natural gas company and assisting in the care and maintenance of pipelines and other facilities. Cao Yunfeng rides an electric bike around the village every day, checking the natural gas main pipeline and 17 gas pressure regulator boxes. After confirming that everything is normal, he also visits some villagers. In Zhuozhou City, more than 5,600 damaged gas wall-mounted boilers and more than 2,900 air source heat pumps have been repaired or replaced. In order to reduce the financial pressure on the people, Zhuozhou City provides a subsidy of 1,000 yuan for each wall-mounted boiler and 5,000 yuan for each air source heat pump on the basis of ensuring the gas source. In Laishui County, Baoding, Hebei Province, 10 villages and towns located in mountainous and hilly areas will use clean coal for heating this winter, and the usage is expected to be around 51,000 tons. Laishui County urges relevant enterprises to plan, connect and reserve early, and organize vehicles to speed up distribution to ensure high supply and timely supply.

;

;Since the flood season this year, rare heavy rains and floods have occurred in Liaoning, affecting nine regions including Dalian, Anshan, and Fushun. The housing and construction departments in the disaster-stricken areas have consolidated their responsibilities and carried out the restoration and reconstruction of farm houses damaged by the disaster in a practical and detailed manner. All rural houses damaged by disasters belonging to low-income group farmers, such as those belonging to the sixth category of key targets, will be included in the dilapidated house renovation plan, and construction will begin in advance to complete renovation and reconstruction work as soon as possible. For damaged houses that have not been included in the dilapidated house renovation plan, funds will be used as a whole to promote renovation and renovation work to ensure that farmers are safe and warm through the winter. At present, the restoration and reconstruction tasks of 613 rural houses damaged by the disaster have been completed.

;

;;Visit and investigate, solve urgent, difficult and anxious problems in a timely manner;

;

;In Xinkai Village, Kaiyuan Town, Shulan City, Jilin, Tan Hongpeng, organizational member of the town party committee, was running in a building Between the new houses, "After the disaster, the newly opened village has realized the overall relocation. I went to see if the villagers' new homes are warm." Walking into the home of villager Xu Zhongren, the room temperature reached 23 degrees Celsius.

;

;Shulan City took the theme education as an opportunity to carry out research activities on post-disaster recovery and reconstruction of people’s livelihood issues. Cadres at both the rural and rural levels used methods such as house visits and telephone inquiries to follow up and connect, and to solve the urgent problems and worries of the people. issues to ensure that people stay safe and warm through the winter.

;

;Party members and cadres in Hailin City, Heilongjiang Province conducted village-by-village and household-by-household verification visits, formulated a “one household, one policy” plan and established relevant accounts to solve practical problems. Chen Zhixi lives in Shanzuizi Village, Korean Town, Xin'an, and has experienced floods. Some time ago, the working group visited the village and found that there were cracks in the partition wall of his house and the fire pit collapsed. The working group immediately organized efforts to repair it. Now that all the damaged parts of the house have been renovated, and after passing the inspection, Chen Zhixi moved back home in time. "This sliding door and this fire bed are all newly replaced, so they are easy to burn." Chen Zhixi said.

;

;In the theme education, the Inner Mongolia Xing'an League Zhalaite Banner has solidly promoted the work of "joining households with one heart" for party members, strengthened the visits of village work teams, gacha and community cadres to households, and strived to promptly discover the people around them. Problem, do your work first. Wang Jinshan, an old man from Gegen Aobao community in Huerle Town, is disabled and has difficulty moving. Community cadres were worried that the elderly man would not have enough coal stored for the winter, so he booked affordable coal for him in advance. "They often come to ask me what I need and take care of me, which makes me feel warm in my heart." Wang Jinshan said.

;

;(Our reporters Zhang Zhifeng, Wang Haonan, Pan Junqiang, Jin Bo, Li Jiading, Liu Jiahua, Fangyuan, Zheng Zhiwen, and Zhang Xi participated in the reporting)

;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;Data source: Ministry of Education
;Drawing: Zhang Fangman

;
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, November 12th   (Reporters Wu Dan, Wu Yue) The reporter learned from the press conference of the Ministry of Education: In order to support the continuous optimization of the structure of the rural teacher team, from 2018 to 2023, the central government has allocated a total of 85.5 billion yuan to continue to support the implementation of relevant plans and policies. , guide teachers to take root in rural areas and serve the grassroots.

;

;Ma Hongbing, deputy director of the Department of Science, Education and Culture of the Ministry of Finance, said that in accordance with the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee and the State Council, the Ministry of Finance and the Ministry of Education have continued to implement relevant plans and policies in recent years to guide teachers to underdeveloped areas and Go to rural schools to teach and support teaching, and take root in serving the grassroots.

;

;Support the implementation of the special post plan. From 2018 to 2023, the central government has allocated a total of 53.3 billion yuan to provide salary subsidies to teachers on special posts, support college graduates to teach in rural schools in central and western regions, and supplement a large number of outstanding teachers for underdeveloped areas.

;

;Support the implementation of the "Three Districts" Talent Plan Teacher Special Project and the Silver Age Lecture Plan. From 2018 to 2023, the central government has allocated a total of 2.1 billion yuan to encourage outstanding compulsory education teachers and retired teachers to teach in poverty-stricken areas, ethnic minority areas, old revolutionary base areas, and border areas. Starting from 2020, nearly 100 million yuan has also been allocated to support the Ministry of Education in organizing and implementing the plan for senior university teachers to support the western region, and to select a group of outstanding retired teachers from universities to support teaching and research to improve the development level of higher education in the western region.

;

;Support the implementation of rural teachers’ living subsidy policy. From 2018 to 2023, a total of 30 billion yuan has been allocated to guide the central and western regions to adopt differentiated subsidy policies to attract more outstanding teachers to teach in rural schools, benefiting 1.3 million teachers every year.

;

;“In the next step, we will work with the Ministry of Education to optimize and improve policies and measures in a timely manner, increase investment, optimize the expenditure structure, support and guide local governments to continue to strengthen the construction of rural teachers, improve the quality of education, and gradually narrow the gap between urban and rural areas. , to accelerate the high-quality and balanced development of compulsory education and urban-rural integration." Ma Hongbing said.

;; Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 江西积极探索生态产品价值实现路径http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20231113_4-01.htm
;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: “We must actively explore and promote the path of transforming green waters and lush mountains into mountains of gold and silver, and choose the path that meets the conditions We will carry out pilot projects on the ecological product value realization mechanism in various regions, and explore a path for realizing the value of ecological products that is government-led, participated by enterprises and all sectors of society, market-oriented and sustainable." In-depth implementation of the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important speech, Jiangxi has accelerated the promotion of national ecological civilization The construction of the pilot zone is planned from the aspects of ecological product value calculation, ecological resource transformation, ecological brand cultivation, and creation of ecological industrial chain, actively exploring the path to realize the value of ecological products, and transforming ecological advantages into development advantages.

;

;Not far away from Changshui Village, Wuning County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, more than 20 B&Bs are built against the mountains. "To build these B&Bs, not a single tree was cut down. This summer alone, the profit exceeded 200,000 yuan," said villager Lu Xianfeng.

;

;Turn green into gold, thanks to the Ecological Product Value Transformation Center jointly established by Wuning County and Nanchang University in May 2021. On this "ecological + big data" platform, based on remote sensing image data and ecological resource property rights confirmation data, even a tree can be stored in the database to realize value assessment and facilitate the large-scale collection, storage and industrial operation of ecological products. .

;

;Relying on his 700 acres of forest, Lu Xianfeng received a loan of 750,000 yuan from the center that year for the construction and operation of a B&B. "With the support of the center, the village has also built an ecological recycling industrial park. In 2022, the industrial park will achieve a total income of 1.39 million yuan, and the per capita net income of the village will exceed 20,000 yuan." Lu Xianfeng said, "Having tasted the benefits, we will protect it more carefully This is a land of good mountains and good waters."

;

;Not just Wuning County, Jiangxi has carried out gross ecosystem product (GEP) accounting work in 3 districts and cities and 11 counties, and on this basis , gradually introduce and pilot the province's unified GEP accounting technical specifications, accounting statistical report system, ecological asset value assessment and management methods, etc.

;

;In 2021, Jiangxi issued the "Implementation Plan on Establishing and Improving the Value Realization Mechanism of Ecological Products" to improve the operation model of the transformation platform by building an ecological product value accounting and evaluation system. "Improving the brand value of ecological products, innovating green financial services, accelerating the construction of an 'ecological+' industrial system and other measures, promoting the green integration of primary, secondary and tertiary industries, and turning green resources into 'golden assets'." said Deputy Chairman of Jiangxi Provincial Development and Reform Commission Director Liu Bing introduced.

;

;In the forest polygonatum cultivation base of Mo Yingfu, a villager in Baishu Village, Qiping Town, Tonggu County, Yichun City, six villagers are boxing and packaging the polygonatum to be sent to other places.

;

;The soil in Baishu Village has high selenium content and is rich in various selenium-rich agricultural products. Under the guidance of experts from the local agricultural and rural departments and the Jiangxi Academy of Forestry Sciences, Mo Yingfu adopted a wild planting method under the forest. Except for manual weeding twice a year, no human intervention was performed. "The selenium-rich Polygonatum vinifera grown by us has been certified as a green organic geographical indication agricultural product in Jiangxi Province. It is almost the same as wild Polygonatum vinifera, and the price is twice that of ordinary products." According to reports, the planting area of ​​Polygonatum odoratum in Tonggu County reaches 50,000 acres, and the industry is 11,300 personnel.

;

;So far, Jiangxi has created 49 national standardized production bases for green food raw materials, released a series of "Jiangxi Green Ecology" regional public brand standards, developed 5,748 green organic geographical indication agricultural products, and the total output value of selenium-rich agriculture exceeds 60 billion yuan.

;

;Jiangxi strives to make "ecological +" articles, which not only increases the added value of ecological products, but also allows ecological industry chains to "grow" from the green waters and green mountains.

;

;On Dajue Mountain, the bamboo forest rises and falls with the mountain, stretching endlessly. Following a truck loaded with bamboo materials into the Bamboo Science and Technology Industrial Park in Zixi County, Fuzhou City, one can see the orderly production workshops and new factories under construction... one can feel the vitality of local bamboo and wood processing enterprises.

;

;Zixi County takes the lead in exploring effective ways to realize ecological value conversion and encourages financial institutions within the county to carry out at least one ecological resource pledge financing innovation. "No mortgage or guarantee is required. This year, Zixi Rural Commercial Bank provided a special loan of 10 million yuan based on our industrial chain and industry value, allowing us to have sufficient liquidity." In the Bamboo Science and Technology Industrial Park, Jiangxi Zhuangchi Bamboo Development Wu Youqing, chairman of the company, told reporters, "The second phase of the factory was put into operation in April this year, and has now achieved operating income of more than 10 million yuan."

;

;Relying on 530,000 acres of moso bamboo resources in Zixi County, the Bamboo Science and Technology Industrial Park has There are 22 enterprises above the designated level, covering upstream bamboo drawing, midstream bamboo board, downstream bamboo home furnishing and other industries. The ecological industrial chain of moso bamboo deep processing has been formed.

;

;"Including Zixi County, Jiangxi Province has created a total of 8 'lucid waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets' practice innovation bases awarded by the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, ranging from moso bamboo processing, porcelain tea integration, and all-region tourism In other aspects, we will build an ecological industrial chain. The underforest economy alone will have a comprehensive output value exceeding 180 billion yuan in 2022." Liu Bing introduced.

;

;“In the next step, we will continue to deepen the construction of the national ecological civilization experimental zone, strive to broaden the path to realize the transformation of green waters and lush mountains into gold and silver mountains, and provide more replicable and popularizable reform experience for the construction of ecological civilization. "Yin Hong, Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee, said.

; Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 前10月汽车产销同比分别增长8%和9.1%http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20231113_5-01.htm
;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, November 12th  (Reporter Wang Zheng) The reporter recently learned from the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers : Driven by factors such as the successive implementation of consumption-promoting policies, the centralized launch of new products, and the stabilization and recovery of the logistics industry, my country's automobile market has generally shown a trend of "not weak in the off-season, but even more prosperous in the peak season." The popularity of the automobile market continues, and the "Golden Nine and Silver Ten" effects are significant. In the first ten months, automobile production and sales reached 24.016 million units and 23.967 million units respectively, a year-on-year increase of 8% and 9.1% respectively.

;

;The monthly automobile production and sales hit a record high for the same period in the history of that month. In October, automobile production and sales completed 2.891 million units and 2.853 million units respectively, a year-on-year increase of 11.2% and 13.8% respectively. Among them, the production and sales of passenger vehicles increased by 7.6% and 11.4% respectively year-on-year; the production and sales of commercial vehicles increased by 42.7% and 33.4% respectively.

;

;The monthly production and sales of new energy vehicles hit a new high. In October, the production and sales of new energy vehicles were 989,000 and 956,000 respectively, a year-on-year increase of 29.2% and 33.5% respectively, and the market share reached 33.5%. In the first ten months, the production and sales of new energy vehicles were 7.352 million and 7.28 million respectively, a year-on-year increase of 33.9% and 37.8% respectively, and the market share reached 30.4%.

;

;Automobile exports continue to grow rapidly. In the first ten months, 3.922 million vehicles were exported, a year-on-year increase of 59.7%. In terms of vehicle types, passenger car exports were 3.306 million units, a year-on-year increase of 67.3%; commercial vehicle exports were 616,000 units, a year-on-year increase of 28.3%. In the first ten months, the export of traditional fuel vehicles was 2.927 million units, a year-on-year increase of 49.6%; the export of new energy vehicles was 995,000 units, a year-on-year increase of 99.1%.

;

;“In the first 10 months, the overall performance of automobile production and sales was better than expected.” Chen Shihua, deputy secretary-general of the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers, said that as various policies to promote automobile consumption and stabilize industry growth continue to be implemented, the effects continue to accumulate. It will form a strong support for the automobile market and help the automobile industry achieve its goal of steady growth throughout the year.

;; Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 青春因拼搏而精彩（今日谈）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20231113_7-01.htm
;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: “The new era is an era for dream chasers, and it is also an era for young people to achieve their dreams.”

;

;In the track and field competition, 17-year-old Wu Haolin set a new national junior 100-meter record in 10 seconds 31; in the weightlifting competition, 19-year-old Hu Yuting won the championship with a snatch of 93 kg, a clean and jerk of 113 kg, and a total score of 206 kg. The snatch score exceeded the world youth record at this level; in the fin swimming competition, 17-year-old Yao Huali broke two world youth records in the women's 100-meter instrument swimming and 50-meter diving... In recent days, at the first National Student (Youth) Games, from Nearly 18,000 athletes from 101 delegations across the country challenged themselves and achieved great results, showing their good mental outlook and high competitive level.

;

;Life shines because of dreams, youth is wonderful because of hard work. Going all out for dreams and persevering for love are not only a vivid interpretation of the Chinese sports spirit, but also the value pursuit of every young athlete. "Have a fighting mentality and hit every sword well", this is the belief of Guo Yifan, a men's foil fencer of the Hefei team; "Treat the competition as training", this is the winning secret of Li Yantan, a rock climber of the Beihai team; "I will continue to work hard , achieved double harvest in sports and academics." This is the voice of Zhang Jialun, who won the men's 100-meter championship in the middle school group after the game... They fought tenaciously and fought bravely to be first, showing their high-spirited youthful style and inspiring more young people. Inspire youth with struggle and pursue dreams with diligence.

;

;Youth breeds infinite hope, and young people create a better tomorrow. By embracing dreams and being down-to-earth, by daring to think, to act, and to do well, young people will surely be able to show their most beautiful youth and achieve a more exciting life.

;; Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 为亚太稳定繁荣作出更多贡献http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20231113_2-02.htm
;Monday, November 13, 2023
; ;

;The vast Pacific Ocean connects the most dynamic growth belt of the global economy.

;

;The 30th APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting will be held in San Francisco, USA. At present, the situation in the Asia-Pacific region is generally stable, regional cooperation continues to make progress, and peaceful development and win-win cooperation are the mainstream. At the same time, the world has entered a new period of turbulence and change, with geopolitical tensions and the evolution of the economic landscape overlapping, impacting the development environment and cooperation structure in the Asia-Pacific region. The international community expects this meeting to play a leading role in the Asia-Pacific, build consensus in the Asia-Pacific, and promote all parties to jointly build an Asia-Pacific community with a shared future that is open, inclusive, innovative in growth, interconnected, and win-win cooperation.

;

;This year marks the 30th anniversary of the first APEC leaders’ meeting. Over the past 30 years, China's deepening of reform and opening up has been accompanied by the continuous expansion of Asia-Pacific economic cooperation. Since 2013, President Xi Jinping has attended or chaired all APEC leaders’ informal meetings and delivered important speeches.从“亚太命运共同体”到“亚太梦想”，从“亚太伙伴关系”到“全方位互联互通蓝图”，中国理念、中国方案在亚太地区引发强烈共鸣，为亚太稳定繁荣作出更多贡献。

;

;;“对加强区域合作、重振发展活力具有重要意义”;

;

;“我们要顺应时代潮流，维护自由、开放、非歧视的多边贸易体制，反对各种形式的保护主义。我们要携手建设开放型经济和区域合作框架，以开放包容精神推进亚太自由贸易区建设。”10年前，印度尼西亚巴厘岛，习近平主席倡议维护和发展开放型经济，推动亚太地区形成政策协调、增长联动、利益融合的开放发展格局，既着眼于解决亚太面临的挑战，也为未来发展开出良方。

;

;中国的开放和发展与亚太紧密相连，中国始终是亚太区域经济合作的坚定支持者和积极推动者，将自身发展与区域发展紧密结合，以自身对外开放带动区域整体开放。 2013年以来，习近平主席在亚太经合组织平台上，始终强调开放包容、合作共赢，推动亚太合作朝着正确方向前进——

;

;“亚太经合组织是一个大家庭，打造发展创新、增长联动、利益融合的开放型亚太经济格局，符合所有成员共同利益。为了实现上述目标，亚太经济体需要共同构建互信、包容、合作、共赢的亚太伙伴关系，为亚太地区和世界经济发展增添动力。”9年前，燕山脚下，雁栖湖畔，习近平主席指出，“亚太发展前景取决于今天的决断和行动。我们有责任为本地区人民创造和实现亚太梦想。”亚太伙伴关系和亚太梦想的确立，是亚太区域合作和亚太地区处理国家关系理念的重大进步，为亚太地区长远发展和共同繁荣勾画新愿景，指引新方向，注入新动力。

;

;“中国愿同各方一道，以发展为主题，扩大开放，促进区域经济一体化、互联互通，推进改革创新，共同绘制亚太合作的宏伟画卷。”2016年，习近平主席提出亚太发展与合作的中国方案：以发展为主轴，以区域经济一体化、互联互通、改革创新为支撑，以伙伴关系为保障，形成亚太经合组织中长期合作架构，擘画通往亚太共同体的路线图。

;

;“不同文明、制度、道路的多样性及交流互鉴可以为人类社会进步提供强大动力。我们应该少一点傲慢和偏见、多一些尊重和包容，拥抱世界的丰富多样，努力做到求同存异、取长补短，谋求和谐共处、合作共赢。”2018年，习近平主席的重要阐述弘扬亚太伙伴关系的主旋律，为亚太和全球合作沿着正确轨道前行提供了正能量。

;

;2020年，亚太经合组织茂物目标到期，面临制定2020年后合作愿景的历史性任务。 “无论是赢得全球抗疫最终胜利，还是推动世界经济复苏，国际社会必须团结协作，共同应对危机考验。”习近平主席高举多边主义旗帜，全面阐述构建亚太命运共同体的理念主张和深刻内涵，强调亚太经济合作从来不是零和博弈、你输我赢的政治游戏，而是相互成就、互利共赢的发展平台。

;

;“我们要推进落实2040年愿景，构建开放包容、创新增长、互联互通、合作共赢的亚太命运共同体。”2021年，习近平主席深刻把握地区发展大势和时代进步潮流，旗帜鲜明地指出开放是亚太合作的生命线，要坚持开放的地区主义。

;

;“维护国际公平正义，建设和平稳定的亚太”“坚持开放包容，建设共同富裕的亚太”“坚持绿色低碳发展，建设清洁美丽的亚太”“坚持命运与共，建设守望相助的亚太”。 2022年，习近平主席提出关于亚太未来发展与合作的重大主张，为亚太经合组织树立起共建亚太命运共同体、再创区域合作新辉煌的行动路标。

;

;…………

;

;从擘画蓝图，到完善架构，再到扎实推动，中国理念凝聚区域合作共识，中国方案照亮务实合作前路，中国行动推动区域共筑梦想。

;

;“习近平主席提出的合作主张对亚太经合组织成员应对疫情挑战和实现经济复苏提供了重要指引”“构建亚太命运共同体的中国方案，对加强区域合作、重振发展活力具有重要意义”“中国主张引导亚太合作沿着正确方向前进，为地区和世界和平稳定与发展繁荣作出重要贡献”……在国际人士眼中，中国方案与中国作用，彰显一个大国的责任与担当。

;

;多年来，中国理念和主张多次写入亚太经合组织重要成果文件：中方倡议占亚太经合组织领导人北京会议上百项成果倡议的一半以上；2020年通过的《2040年亚太经合组织布特拉加亚愿景》提出，2040年建成开放、活力、强韧、和平的亚太共同体，实现亚太人民和子孙后代的共同繁荣，体现了亚太命运共同体的核心理念；2021年通过的《2040年亚太经合组织布特拉加亚愿景》落实计划，重申要落实中方倡议的亚太经合组织《互联网和数字经济路线图》和亚太经合组织互联互通蓝图；2022年通过的《2022年亚太经合组织领导人宣言》和《生物循环绿色经济曼谷目标》，体现了中国关于共建亚太命运共同体、新发展理念等政策主张……国际舆论评价，中国成为团结各方应对共同挑战的引领力量。

;

;“我们要以战略和长远眼光看待亚太合作，维护亚太经合组织在区域合作中的主渠道地位，维护亚太合作正确方向。”布特拉加亚愿景的种子已经播下，中国期待与各方一道培育亚太共同发展的繁荣之花。

;

;;“中国发展离不开亚太，亚太繁荣也离不开中国”;

;

;汇聚千流的广袤太平洋，见证中国同世界经济和国际体系的深度融合。

;

;今年是中国改革开放45周年。在这一特殊年份回望中国与亚太、中国与世界的关系，其中蕴含的历史启迪弥足珍贵。改革开放后，中国参与的第一个区域经济合作组织就是亚太经合组织。中国循序渐进推进改革，加速对外开放步伐，在实现自身发展的同时，同亚太乃至世界分享发展机遇。

;

;落其实思其树，饮其流怀其源。 “中国的发展受益于亚太，也用自身发展回馈亚太、造福亚太”“无论发展到什么程度，中国都将扎根亚太、建设亚太、造福亚太”“中国是亚太大家庭的一员，中国的发展起步于亚太，得益于亚太，也将继续立足亚太、造福亚太”……习近平主席多次在亚太经合组织平台上明晰宣示，中国一直积极融入亚太区域合作，始终是亚太开放合作的推动者。

;

;坚持开放的地区主义，数字是有力证据。

;

;2022年，中国与亚太地区贸易额达3.1万亿美元，同比增长19.2%，占中国外贸总额的36.8%；同期，中国高质量实施《区域全面经济伙伴关系协定》（RCEP），对其他成员国进出口总额达12.95万亿元人民币，同比增长7.5%。

;

;从2014年亚太经合组织领导人北京会议上推动启动亚太自由贸易区进程，到积极推进加入《全面与进步跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》（CPTPP）和《数字经济伙伴关系协定》（DEPA），再到与东盟积极推进中国—东盟自贸区3.0版建设，中国一步一个脚印，不断深化与地区经济体的贸易投资合作，为建设开放型亚太经济持续贡献力量。印度尼西亚经济统筹部副部长埃迪·普里奥·潘布迪感叹，中国是促进世界经济增长的动力，也是RCEP实施的重要推动力。

;

;23天，行程2万公里，这是“樱桃快航”货轮运送智利车厘子进入中国的时间，比10年前缩短了10天左右。在疫后经济复苏的关键时刻，这些跨越南北半球的一颗颗水果，是中国经济与亚太经济始终相互依存、深度融合的见证。根据亚洲开发银行发布的《2023年亚洲经济一体化报告》，亚太地区经济今年上半年的复苏很大程度上得益于中国，中国对该地区的经济增长贡献率达64.2%。

;

;“中方对于经济规律和市场原则的尊重，给亚太经济体树立了榜样”“中国坚持真正的多边主义、坚定维护多边贸易体制，将助力推进亚太自由贸易区进程”“中国在推动区域经济一体化方面起到的作用是如此重要，在这个时间点，我们需要中国在亚太、在全球引领这一进程”“中国积极支持全球与区域经济复苏，亚太地区实现和平稳定与繁荣发展离不开中国贡献”……在当前国际环境下，国际人士对于中国经济与亚太合作的生动观察，凸显“亚太是个大家庭，中国是大家庭中的一员。中国发展离不开亚太，亚太繁荣也离不开中国”。

;

;;“让亚太地区经济发展走在世界前列”;

;

;“为所有人创建强韧和可持续未来”，亚太经合组织第三十次领导人非正式会议的主题，传递出绿色和创新对于亚太地区的重要意义。

;

;“坚持绿色低碳发展，建设清洁美丽的亚太”“中国式现代化必须走人与自然和谐共生的新路。这是对我们自己负责，也是对世界负责”“要坚持绿色低碳发展，打造绿色产业和绿色金融，加快构建亚太绿色合作格局，让亚太地区经济发展走在世界前列”……对于亚太未来发展繁荣，习近平主席提出一系列重要主张，其中“绿色”是关键词之一。

;

;在中国政府的积极推动和中国企业的积极参与下，亚太经合组织可持续能源中心、中国—太平洋岛国应对气候变化合作中心等合作平台逐步搭建，墨西哥尤卡坦半岛齐拉姆红树林保护区等绿色发展项目落地生根，为共建清洁美丽的亚太贡献中国智慧、中国方案。亚太经合组织秘书处执行主任丽贝卡·玛利亚表示，中国以实际行动展现了实现可持续发展的决心，践行了在可持续发展方面的国际承诺。

;

;依托数字孪生技术，中国科学家正在为拉美国家的海洋生物多样性保护提供更多中国方案；引入5G、云计算和人工智能等技术，中国企业帮助泰国医院服务流程实现全面智能化转型；借助中国—东盟信息港，中国—东盟跨境经贸服务水平不断提升……中国不仅自身在科技创新和数字经济发展方面走在世界前列，同时还积极倡导在亚太乃至世界范围内推进数字化转型，为亚太长远发展打下更加坚实的基础。

;

;积极践行亲诚惠容理念，全面发展同周边国家的友好合作关系；携手推进高质量共建“一带一路”，促进亚太互联互通建设水平提升；倡议设立亚洲基础设施投资银行，为区域基础设施建设提供融资支持；高标准举办广交会、服贸会、消博会、链博会等国际展会，与各方携手谱写开放合作、互利共赢故事；刚刚落幕的第六届进博会取得丰硕成果，按年计意向成交创历届新高，金额达784.1亿美元、比上届增长6.7%……中国坚持推进高水平对外开放，不断以中国新发展为亚太和世界提供新机遇，为推动建设开放型世界经济贡献中国力量。

;

;;“坚定不移推动构建亚太命运共同体”;

;

;人口占世界总人口1/3、经济在全球占比超过六成、贸易占比将近一半，亚太地区是世界经济增长的动力之源。今年以来，在全球经济复苏乏力的大背景下，亚太地区经济展现韧性和活力。

;

;亚太经合组织首次领导人会议召开30年来，在世界经济大潮中，亚太经合组织为构建开放型世界经济、支持多边贸易体制、引领经济全球化发挥了积极作用。

;

;正如太平洋因联通四海而活力澎湃，开放是亚太合作的生命线。推进区域经济一体化，构建亚太命运共同体，实现社会稳定和生活幸福是亚太各国的共同追求和愿望。

;

;在秘鲁中部海拔3000多米胡宁省首府万卡约市，一条中企承建的公路沿着安第斯山脉盘旋向东，成为连接秘鲁安第斯山区和热带雨林地区的重要交通线。 “我希望这条路给我带来更美好的生活。”当地居民对未来的生活更有盼头；

;

;柬埔寨东部磅湛省出产的香蕉绝大部分运往中国市场。随着越来越多的新鲜水果相继获准出口中国，柬埔寨水果种植业发展迅速。柬埔寨农林渔业大臣邓迪那表示，水果出口中国市场，对柬埔寨而言是重要机遇；

;

;…………

;

;“太平洋之所以广大，是因为它没有任何自然阻隔，我们不应该为它设定人为的阻隔。”“亚太是我们共同发展的空间，我们都是亚太这片大海中前行的风帆。亚太未来发展攸关亚太经合组织每个成员的利益。”“中国愿同所有国家在相互尊重、平等互利的基础上和平共处、共同发展。”“中国将坚定不移推动构建亚太命运共同体，为亚太稳定繁荣作出更多贡献。”从2013年强调牢固树立亚太命运共同体意识，到2014年倡导共建互信、包容、合作、共赢的亚太伙伴关系，再到2019年提出构建开放包容、创新增长、互联互通、合作共赢的亚太命运共同体；从2021年全面阐述构建亚太命运共同体深刻内涵，到2022年提出建设关于亚太未来发展与合作重大主张，中国始终高举构建亚太命运共同体旗帜，引领亚太合作方向。

;

;构建亚太命运共同体倡导真正的多边主义、坚持开放的区域主义，受到亚太各方的高度赞赏和支持：“反映了地区人民求和平、谋合作的共同心声，有助于维护亚太合作正确方向，体现了中国作为大国的责任担当”“开放的亚太需要各经济体携手构建开放包容、创新增长、互联互通、合作共赢的亚太命运共同体”“我们期待中国推动各方朝着构建亚太命运共同体目标迈进，携手开创亚太经济合作新篇章”……

;

;大国之大，在于责任重大。美国是亚太经合组织第三十次领导人非正式会议的东道主。中美两国是全球前两大经济体，经济总量超过世界1/3、人口总数占世界近1/4、双边贸易额约占世界1/5，在驱动亚太经济增长、促进亚太区域合作中发挥着独特的重要作用。宽广的地球完全容得下中美各自发展、共同繁荣。中美关系真正稳下来、好起来，不仅符合两国和两国人民根本利益，也将为亚太乃至世界的和平与繁荣发挥建设性作用。

;

;党的二十大报告提出：“推动世界贸易组织、亚太经合组织等多边机制更好发挥作用，扩大金砖国家、上海合作组织等合作机制影响力，增强新兴市场国家和发展中国家在全球事务中的代表性和发言权。”面对世界经济不稳定性不确定性明显增强，一个脚踏实地、勇毅前行的中国，将为充满不确定性的世界带来更多稳定性与正能量；一个自信开放、奋发有为的中国，将以自身新发展为世界提供新机遇、新动力；一个胸怀天下、笃行担当的中国，将为促进人类和平与发展、繁荣与进步带来新启迪、新希望。

;

;***  ***

;

;“知者不惑，仁者不忧，勇者不惧。”世界又一次站在历史的十字路口，新形势下，亚太各经济体要汲取历史经验和教训，因应时代挑战，坚定推进区域经济一体化，共同开拓发展新局面，构建亚太命运共同体，以亚太地区的稳定和繁荣，为世界的和平与发展贡献智慧和力量。

;

;浩渺行无极，扬帆但信风。中国愿同地区伙伴一道，坚持真正的多边主义、开放的区域主义，以自身发展带动他人发展，以协调联动最大限度发挥各自优势，推动亚太成为合作发展的高地，为亚太和全球可持续发展注入更强劲的动力。

;新华社阿瓦鲁阿11月11日电  中国政府太平洋岛国事务特使钱波当地时间10日在库克群岛首都阿瓦鲁阿出席第五十二届太平洋岛国论坛期间阐述了中国发展同太平洋岛国友好关系的政策，强调共建“一带一路”将为岛国落实《蓝色太平洋2050战略》带来重大机遇。

;

;钱波阐述了中国发展同太平洋岛国友好关系的“四个充分尊重”政策，介绍第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛取得的丰硕成果，特别是高质量共建“一带一路”的八项行动，强调共建“一带一路”将为岛国落实《蓝色太平洋2050战略》带来重大机遇。中方将坚持高水平对外开放，愿同岛国加强“一带一路”框架内合作，充分发挥中国国际进口博览会以及中国同太平洋岛国应急物资、应对气变、减贫发展、防灾减灾、农业、菌草六大合作平台等作用，以实际行动支持岛国落实2050战略，推动构建更加紧密的中国和太平洋岛国命运共同体。

;

;会上，钱波宣布了中方支持岛国发展新的具体举措，得到与会各方热烈欢迎和高度评价。
